Articles.Content: So, basically I got ksp as a Christmas gift a couple years back, but I didn't know how good it was, so it mostly remained unplayed. Then, I watched a video on it and I saw how much fun it was, so I decided to give it a go. I entered the launcher, and it wanted me to log into the ksp store. Unfortunately, since it's been a few years, no one remembered the email or password that was used to log in. I was hoping a mod or someone could help me with this, because I really want to give this game a go. Thanks!
@Ijbindustries email [email protected] or look at the support section on the website https://kerbalspaceprogram.com/en/?page_id=19
